10px%3Bfont-weight%3A600%3Bcursor%3Apointer%7D.run%7Bbackground%3A%230b69ff%3Bcolor%3A%23fff%7D.cancel%7Bbackground%3A%23e2e8f0%7D.tiny%7Bfont-size%3A11px%3Bcolor%3A%23475569%3Bmargin-top%3A6px%7D%60%3Bconst FT%3D%5B%7Bkey%3A'pdf'%2Clabel%3A'PDF'%7D%2C%7Bkey%3A'ppt'%2Clabel%3A'PPT%2FPPTX'%7D%2C%7Bkey%3A'doc'%2Clabel%3A'DOC%2FDOCX'%7D%2C%7Bkey%3A'xls'%2Clabel%3A'XLS%2FXLSX%2FCSV'%7D%2C%7Bkey%3A'txt'%2Clabel%3A'TXT%2FXML%2FRTF'%7D%2C%5D%3Bconst ENGS%3D%5B%7Bkey%3A'google'%2Clabel%3A'Google'%7D%2C%7Bkey%3A'bing'%2Clabel%3A'Bing'%7D%2C%7Bkey%3A'ddg'%2Clabel%3A'DuckDuckGo'%7D%2C%5D%3Bconst FT_QUERIES%3D%7Bpdf%3A'filetype%3Apdf OR ext%3Apdf'%2Cppt%3A'filetype%3Appt OR ext%3Appt OR filetype%3Apptx OR ext%3Apptx'%2Cdoc%3A'filetype%3Adoc OR ext%3Adoc OR filetype%3Adocx OR ext%3Adocx'%2Cxls%3A'filetype%3Axls OR ext%3Axls OR filetype%3Axlsx OR ext%3Axlsx OR filetype%3Acsv OR ext%3Acsv'%2Ctxt%3A'filetype%3Atxt OR ext%3Atxt OR filetype%3Axml OR ext%3Axml OR filetype%3Artf OR ext%3Artf'%7D%3Bconst ENGINES%3D%7Bgoogle%3Aq%3D>%60https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%24%7BencodeURIComponent(q)%7D%26filter%3D0%60%2Cbing%3Aq%3D>%60https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D%24%7BencodeURIComponent(q)%7D%60%2Cddg%3Aq%3D>%60https%3A%2F%2Fduckduckgo.com%2F%3Fq%3D%24%7BencodeURIComponent(q)%7D%60%2C%7D%3Bconst STORE_KEY%3D'dfj-settings-v3'%3Bconst loadSettings%3D()%3D>%7Btry%7Breturn JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORE_KEY)%7C%7C '%7B%7D')%3B%7Dcatch%7Breturn%7B%7D%3B%7D%7D%3Bconst saveSettings%3D(obj)%3D>%7Btry%7BlocalStorage.setItem(STORE_KEY%2CJSON.stringify(obj))%3B%7Dcatch%7B%7D%7D%3Bconst host%3Ddocument.createElement('div')%3Bhost.id%3D'dfj-host'%3Bconst root%3Dhost.attachShadow(%7Bmode%3A'closed'%7D)%3Bconst style%3Ddocument.createElement('style')%3Bstyle.textContent%3DSTYLES%3Bconst wrap%3Ddocument.createElement('div')%3Bwrap.className%3D'dfj-wrap'%3Bwrap.innerHTML%3D%60
